nost.helper.ntp_offset module¶

nost.helper.ntp_offset.get_wallclock_offset(last_nist_query)¶

Contacts NTP server (atomic clock) to synchronize internal time with offset.

Parameters

last_nist_query (datetime.datetime) – most recent NTP request.

Returns

Offset from NTP server. datetime.datetime: Time of last NTP request.

Return type

datetime.timedelta
